Roadmap Goals

Source: vignettes/roadmap.Rmd
roadmap.Rmd

Goals for 2026

This roadmap intends to capture the main goals that are planned to be achieved in the next year. However, notice that this is just a high-level picture, and specific tasks and issues will be tracked in the GitHub repository and in the project board.

Developed by Ercan Suekuer, Gerardo Jose Rodriguez, Pascal Baertschi, Jana Spinner, Mateusz Kolomanski, Lucy Aspridis, Valentin Legras, F. Hoffmann-La Roche AG.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
